title: Damage report suggestion: healed/shielded and damage taken?
body:
The damage report is a great tool for understanding your team comp and how it's working.  However, it leaves a number of important details out.  Wardens, Druids, and any defensive front-liner will appear worthless, because their contribution is based on how much damage is done to them, instead of how much damage they dish out.

**Suggestion: ** Add a couple tabs for damage taken, and/or damage healed/shielded.  This would give us a better understanding of the overall contribution of each unit better.  =)
